task_description: Implement and benchmark three world collision strategies (Monolithic, Chunked, Hybrid Octree) with a common WorldCollider trait interface for performance comparison and strategy selection.
completed_work: Phase 1: WorldCollider Trait and Infrastructure (3/3 complete)
Phase 3: Chunked Strategy (4/6 complete - structure, position calc, generate, update)
Phase 4: Hybrid Octree Strategy (5/6 complete - struct, resolve, penetration, integration, tests)
Phase 6: Proto-GL Integration (3/5 complete - refactor, collect_aabbs, resolve)
pending_work: Phase 3.5-3.6: Chunked strategy unit tests (objects approach/leave)
Phase 4.6: Octree query efficiency unit test
Phase 6.3: Call update() before physics step
Phase 6.5: Display metrics in debug overlay
